text: Benjamin Maximilian Lundt (born 24 September 1995) is a German footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for Louisville City FC in the USL Championship on loan from FC Cincinnati. Lundt was the 37th selection in the 2019 MLS SuperDraft. ==References== ==External links== *Profile at Akron Athletics * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Hertha BSC II players Category:Reading United A.C. players Category:FC Cincinnati draft picks Category:FC Cincinnati players Category:Louisville City FC players Category:Regionalliga players Category:USL League Two players Category:Major League Soccer players Category:USL Championship players Category:German footballers Category:German expatriate footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:German expatriate sportspeople in the United States Category:Expatriate soccer players in the United States Category:Footballers from Berlin
title: Ben Lundt
